html: 3.1.21  5:01 am   i think one of the things that's so compelling and satisfying about your music video style, and your musical style for that matter, re-watching 'here comes the sun' for the 15th time or whatever, is how understated a lot of things are, but also how overt and flashy certain things are. like, you'll have little moments that i don't even think about after several viewings, but then i see and i'm like, that's such a nice little moment, a little clip in the background of you doing a little finger wave with your hand or a little random stick figure guy climbing for a second or whatever. that's part of what's so incredible about your style is you have a very acute sense of how to keep things moving, not lingering too long on something, almost cutting things off before they have a chance to be boring, but just long enough to have an impact. it's very scintillating, if i'm allowed to use that word. anyways i hope your new music video is going well and you're doing go od in general. you're one of the most inspiring modern musicians/artists to me and it's really humbling and exciting to be alive at the same time as you. i wish you all the success and happiness that you can handle.
original_html: 3.1.21  5:01 am   i think one of the things that's so compelling and satisfying about your music video style, and your musical style for that matter, re-watching 'here comes the sun' for the 15th time or whatever, is how understated a lot of things are, but also how overt and flashy certain things are. like, you'll have little moments that i don't even think about after several viewings, but then i see and i'm like, that's such a nice little moment, a little clip in the background of you doing a little finger wave with your hand or a little random stick figure guy climbing for a second or whatever. that's part of what's so incredible about your style is you have a very acute sense of how to keep things moving, not lingering too long on something, almost cutting things off before they have a chance to be boring, but just long enough to have an impact. it's very scintillating, if i'm allowed to use that word. anyways i hope your new music video is going well and you're doing go od in general. you're one of the most inspiring modern musicians/artists to me and it's really humbling and exciting to be alive at the same time as you. i wish you all the success and happiness that you can handle.
